arts.ttl: Lee Kang-in unavailable for PSG against Lorient through illness
arts.sum: Paris Saint-Germain have confirmed that Lee Kang-in (24) has been declared unavailable for their upcoming match against Lorient on Wednesday night. The South Korean playmaker has been struck with illness…

arts.ttl: Lorient vs PSG – Possible Paris lineup and risk of suspensions
arts.sum: This Wednesday, Paris Saint-Germain (1st) faces Lorient (16th) at the Stade du Moustoir in the 10th round of Ligue 1 2025-2026 (kickoff at 7 p.m., CET). Paris coach Luis Enrique must choose his starting 11, taking into account the opponent, upcoming matches, and the risk of suspensions, after forming the Parisian squad for this match. […]

arts.ttl: Lorient vs PSG – Paris squad: A major come-back
arts.sum: This Wednesday (kick-off at 7 p.m., CET), Paris Saint-Germain (1st) will face Lorient (16th) at the Stade du Moustoir for Matchday 10 of the 2025-2026 Ligue 1 season. Here is the squad selected by PSG coach Luis Enrique. Goalkeepers – Chevalier, Safonov, Marin. Defenders – Beraldo, Hernandez, Marquinhos, Mendes, Pacho, Zabarnyi. Midfielders – Lee, Mayulu, […]

arts.ttl: PSG XI vs Lorient – Predicted lineup and team news
arts.sum: PSG make the trip to face Lorient in a crucial Ligue 1 clash at the Stade du Moustoir – Yves Allainmat this Wednesday evening. Both teams have plenty to play for. arts.ttl: Lorient vs PSG – Match preview and team news
arts.sum: Lorient and PSG go head-to-head in Ligue 1 on Wednesday at the Stade du Moustoir – Yves Allainmat. Both sides will be looking to secure all three points, with PSG aiming to maintain their position at the top of the table, while Lorient fight to climb out of the relegation zone. arts.ttl: Lorient vs PSG – The referee for the 10th day’s match has been appointed, his statistics
arts.sum: This Wednesday, as part of Matchday 10 of the 2025–2026 Ligue 1 season, Paris Saint-Germain (1st) will face Lorient (8th) at the Stade du Moustoir (kick-off at 7 p.m., CET). The referee for the match has been announced: Willy Delajod (33 years old). Despite his relatively young age, Delajod already has 130 Ligue 1 matches […]
